From hilarious podcasts on your commute to work to adrenaline-fueled bangers while working out, there is a time and place for all types of entertainment. Right now, Amazon Music Unlimited is offering a free one-month trial so you can tune into 75 million songs and podcast episodes wherever your day takes you.

Get deals and shopping advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the experts at Reviewed.

For a limited time, Amazon's music streaming service is offering new subscribers a one-month free trial. Usually costing $9.99 a month ($7.99 for Amazon Prime members), Amazon Music Unlimited is a one-stop shop for listening to podcasts, albums and personalized streaming stations. The best part is that you can savor the sounds of 75 million songs in HD quality without ad interruption and even download them to your device for offline playback. 

► Presidents' Day:  Shop the best deals on TVs, appliances and everything in-between ahead of the holiday.

If you are looking for entertainment for the whole family, consider opting for a one-month free trial of Amazon Music Unlimited's family plan, typically $14.99 a month (available to Prime members only). You can stream on up to six accounts across multiple devices and even block explicit content for the younger users in your family.

After the free trial period, the service will renew at the normal monthly rate, so if you don't want to pay for continued access, you can cancel any time before the promotional period expires.

We named Amazon Music Unlimited one of the best music streaming services around thanks to its song selection (on par with Spotify!) and its Dolby Atmos Music feature, which expands a song's mix selection to include surround sound for a more immersive listening experience. This benefit is now enabled for anyone with a mobile device compatible with the Amazon Music app and any pair of headphones, along with the Amazon Echo Studio speaker ($199.99), which is one of our favorite smart speakers. Though other music streaming services offer more playlists and customization bells and whistles, we think Amazon Music Unlimited is a strong contender and worth trying for a month—for free!

Give Amazon Music Unlimited a spin for a month and turn up the volume on ad-free entertainment no matter where the music takes you. 

Try Amazon Music Unlimited for $0 for one month (Save $9.99 to $14.99).
